recipe_name: Tuna patties with cucumber, chilli and herb relish
author: Lesley Waters
method: For the tuna patties, place all the patty ingredients into the bowl of a food-processor and blend until the mixture is well combined.  Roll the patty mixture into four patties. Heat the olive oil in a small frying pan and fry for three minutes each side or until golden-brown. For the cucumber relish, place all the relish ingredients into a clean medium-sized bowl and mix well to combine. To serve, place the patties on a clean plate and serve with the cucumber relish in a small bowl on the side.
ingredients: 200g/7oz new potatoes, cooked, grated,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp fresh chives, chopped,  1 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped,  150g/5½oz tinned tuna,  1 tbsp black olives, pitted,  1 egg, beaten,  1 tsp plain flour,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 small cucumber, diced,  50ml/2fl oz olive oil,  2 limes, juice only,  ½ fresh red chilli, chopped,  handful fresh coriander leaves, chopped
